item.title: Re: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:41, topic:322469”]Me code pretty gewd…

I’m getting sick of all those people pretending like they know what they are talking about…[/quote]

Yes, but to be honest they could tell the MoparScape community anything, most of thiss community don’t know anything about “coding” anyway.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27-12-2009, 18:39:32[/size][hr][quote=“cows1471, post:52, topic:322469”]people who post single words like:

this

lol

e.t.c.[/quote]

I <3 you, I’m glad someone else is on the same wave length[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27-12-2009, 19:50:42[/size][hr][quote=“Newty, post:13, topic:322469”]This thread is 100% useless and doesn’t deserve a sticky.[/quote]

No it’s not pointless, because now you don’t have an excuse to ignore us when we say something is wrong, maybe now you will listen to us.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:24, topic:322469”]Look on the first page at AMERIKA’s post about Wales 00’s real name.

Why did she moderate him for that?
Stupid things is just …

Idek.[/quote]
Actually, I did. It was complete spam, and if you actually knew AMERIKA, you would know he actually deserved a harsher punishment based on his other offenses.

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:25, topic:322469”][quote author=licorish55 link=topic=418871.msg3078565#msg3078565 date=1262019055]
Look on the first page at AMERIKA’s post about Wales 00’s real name.

Why did she moderate him for that?
Stupid things is just …

Idek.
[/quote]

Because it was completely pointless spam, which could possibly later provoke a flame war, in one way or another.
His name is Keiran.[/quote]
His name is actually Ron iirc.

cows1471:

why was telenim banned?

He got a 30 day ban for continuous trolling and posting inappropriate things.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:37, topic:322469”]I’m not saying you have to.

A LITTLE help is well appreciated, but people don’t even help most of the time.
You’re just told to go fuck off pretty much…

You don’t have to spoon feed someone to help them.[/quote]

This is MoparScape. what do you expect, most of the people here who say they can “code” can’t even tie their fucking shoelaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: Want to cry about the community?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:34, topic:322469”]I wish it was.

Everytime I try to learn from a fellow community member I get pointed to google.com or the search button wich honestly barely works. It brings up random topics with the words your searching for, the topic could have absolutely nothing to do with what you’re looking for.

It’s like instead of learning, they tell you to go elsewhere, in ex. google.com, which just brings up other RSPS forums, it’s like you’re not meant to learn from here. And if you do, your lucky.[/quote]

Were not a spoon fed community, We will help you learn, but we won’t simply allow you to C+P

Read full topic
item.source: Re: Want to cry about the community?

item.description:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:32, topic:322469”][quote author=Newty link=topic=418871.msg3078041#msg3078041 date=1261971252]
This thread is 100% useless and doesn’t deserve a sticky.
[/quote]

Mre enforcement on certain rules, I’ve noticed that some of tem are lapsing a little.

Thank you for being specific?[/quote]

Yes Sorry

-Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them).

-We don’t talk about things we don’t know. This is an informative community.
